mapper.insert: insert into project (name, start_date, end_date, website, detail) values (#{name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{website}, #{detail})
mapper.select: select id, name, start_date, end_date, website, detail from project where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update project set name = #{name}, start_date =#{start_date}, end_date=#{end_date}, website = #{website}, detail = #{detail} where id = #{id}
